info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 1:26PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN FAYETTE AND NORTHEASTERN PRESTON COUNTIES THROUGH 145 PM EDT... At 125 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kingwood, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Kingwood, Terra Alta, Albright, Markleysburg, Valley Point, Hazelton, and Cranesville. This includes Interstate 68 in West Virginia between mile markers 29 and 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
